meanings.definition: A fitting used in mechanical systems for lubrication
meanings.sent1: The zerk on the machine helps keep the gears running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the zerk regularly to ensure proper lubrication.
meanings.sent3: The zerk fitting decided to throw a party for all the other machine parts.
meanings.sent4: The zerk stood out among the mechanical components like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic pointed to the zerk and said, 'This little guy is crucial for maintenance.'

meanings.definition: To attach a zerk fitting to a machine for lubrication purposes
meanings.sent1: I need to zerk the machine before it starts squeaking.
meanings.sent2: He will zerk the equipment to prevent any breakdowns.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic decided to zerk the machine while singing a tune.
meanings.sent4: She zerked the fitting onto the machine with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: Remember to zerk the parts regularly to keep everything running smoothly.
